thread.title: Facebook Search Gets Update In Usefulness
thread.title_full: Facebook Search Gets Update In Usefulness

title: Facebook Search Gets Update In Usefulness
text:
Facebook Search Gets Update In Usefulness 
Web Pro News Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Facebook announced some new search capabilities, potentially making the social network better for finding updates relevant to things you’re looking for or interested in learning about. 
In an email to WebProNews, a spokesperson for the company said, ';Search is an important, long-term effort at Facebook.'; 
Facebook users will now be able to search over both their friends’ posts and public posts. 
As Facebook VP of Search Tom Stocky writes in a Facebook update, ';As you type in the search box, you’ll now see timely, personalized suggestions. You can dive into som...
